website_summaries.verdict: This segmented mat will fold to fit individual pieces of equipment, from long treadmills to short vertical steppers.
pros: Non-slip pebbled surface for extra security
Protects equipment from dust and carpet fibers
cons: Not recommended for heavy equipment on carpeting

customer_reviews.title: Mat still holding up great 9yrs later!
customer_reviews.text: I used this mat underneath an Elliptical to ensure no damage to the floor. 9 years later and it’s still holding up great - even outside in a humid garage. Worked exactly as needed and has lasted. Very impressed
customer_reviews.author: Wingnut

customer_reviews.title: Quality control is a problem
customer_reviews.text: Mine has structural fibers exposed on the back - the rubber doesn't cover the internal structure (it's built like a sandwich of rubber over a fiber mesh, and my rubber coating isn't complete). The external rubber is reasonably grip-y, stiff enough to protect the floor, and honestly the folding feature is a nice touch. Quality control is a problem. The top side is fine, but on the bottom the rubber isn't complete. The internal fibers that give the thing some structure are not covered by the rubber - they are exposed. This will lead to premature failure. An additional minor gripe is that it could be 3-6" longer. My rowing machine juuuuuust barely fits.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: The mat is the perfect size for my weight bench. I currently lease, so it was worth the investment to protect the hardwood floors. I have not had a problem with the mat moving or causing an imbalance with the equipment as mentioned by other reviewers. The pictures include the 'CAP Barbell Standard Bench' atand 'The Step Original Aerobic Platform' at. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Robinson | Pray Continually

customer_reviews.title: This is a great oversized mat for workouts
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these a while ago and sold it to a friend before a long distance move.... I am buying another one. It folds up easily and is much more durable than i thought. I have used it outside for bootcamp sessions and we can fit about 4 ladies at a time on it. Its great!
customer_reviews.author: Beauty and Braun

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for our rower
customer_reviews.text: This Matt is the perfect size for our new rower on the laminate floor. It’s thin enough to be manageable and thick enough to be durable. I havent had any tear or other issues moving the rower on it. Big plus, there is no smell to it. I bought a thicker pad from Home Depot but, after 2 weeks in the garage, I still couldn’t stand the smell so never brought it into the house.
customer_reviews.author: FPoole

customer_reviews.title: Super thin, floppy.
customer_reviews.text: This mat is not 3/4" thick, it's 1/8" thick, at best. 3/4" is the overall thickness of all the layers folded into one stack, then compressed slightly! I bought this to hold a treadmill on top of a deep shag carpet (apartment, I can't remove said carpet). It's so thin and floppy that it's utterly useless at that task. It works for keeping dust, grim, and silicone off the carpet, but for everything else I can't see a use for it. Buy something else if you have thick carpet!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Has held up great for 3 years, ordered another one as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mat for the first time in 2017 for a treadmill that we had purchased and the item. This mat allows you to easily move around the equipment if needed but does not move at all when the equipment is in use. The size was perfect enough to cover the area that the equipment physical sat on without being too big. Recently, I have purchased this mat for a friend who had also purchased some equipment and they loved it as well.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Very Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The mat ended up being the perfect length for what I needed so I didn't have to fold it over but as long as you need to fold it where marked it is easy to do. Will fold up nicely for moving or storage. A little thicker than a yoga mat. My cat enjoys laying on it, lol. Glad I purchased. **UPDATE** I still love this mat, so much that I ordered a second one for another piece of equipment I bought. I had a friend come over and saw the mat and liked it so much he is ordering a couple too. For the price these are really great!
customer_reviews.author: Summer Ceranic

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I have a fairly small elliptical and this just does the trick. Would be too small for a larger machine. It is thin, but protects the floor. It's been several months and there are no indentations on my hardwood floor underneath. That said, I wish it added more cushion for the weight of the machine. I don't know if that is a factor in additional noise from my unit when I am using it. I may have gotten a thicker one if I had to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Clark G

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Happy with purchase. Fold ability is good but can cause difficulty when placing equipment on top of. Resumes shape well and cleans well. More expensive than a roll mat that I purchase and like better. Both mats work well I just prefer the none folding.
customer_reviews.author: budgetmom

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: It's really nice, and looks very durable. (And no horrible odor like some new products!) I thought it having an odd number of sections (7) was going to be a problem with it being level if I used it folded, but the weight of my small elliptical is enough that it is not a problem at all. I folded mine down to just two sections.
customer_reviews.author: KML

customer_reviews.title: Everything I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Works great to keep heavy equipment from marking hardwood floors. Durable and doesn't seem like it will tear if the equipment is moved (hasn't done so so far for me), doesn't really create a raised patch when folded once, has traction, easy to clean if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy H

customer_reviews.title: Great mat, no tearing or damage from rolling our treadmill onto it!
customer_reviews.text: Just rolled our very heavy treadmill onto this mat last night! It was the perfect fit for our treadmill (Golds Gym Trainer 410) and I didn’t have any issue with tearing or any damage to the mat. It does still have some creasing from where it was folded but my husband just lifted one end of the treadmill and I pulled the mat right. I am sure after a few days and another straighting and pulling right the mat will be flat and perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mia D

customer_reviews.title: Fold-to-Fit Mat
customer_reviews.text: This mat was ordered when I purchased a ProGear exercise bike. I love the folds in the mat as it was way too long for the bike. The folds also make the mat easy to place in another location. I would recommend this mat for use under any exercise equipment, or for exercising on any floor. This purchase was well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: M. Love

customer_reviews.title: Great quality mat.
customer_reviews.text: The thing i most like it is his durability .. after a 3 years of having it the mat still very comfortable to do exercises and therapies.. the wide and the long is very convenient plus it can be fold for easy storage .. we like it ..
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: A worthwhile product to protect your investment
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Was worried it might be too thin but moving my treadmill around on it didn't tear it or anything. I'm very pleased with the construction of this matt. No odor, no residue on my carpet, and helps protect my treadmill's motor from fibers and such. Arrived promptly, without incident, and in excellent condition. Seemed to absorb any vibrations using my treadmill might have caused. I'm glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Alfaro

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not for heavy ellipticals on carpet.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be made decent but do not use for elliptical on carpet. It makes the machine very unsteady because the material is very flimsy. Should be fine on hard surfaces. It is a great size but I had to fold the corners in to give it a little stronger support. The machine still rocks a little, which it didn't when on carpet only. The corners folded in helps a little. Pics added to show what I mean. Only 2 stars because description said it works for carpet and ellipticals. Waste of time and money for me.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Totally bunched and slid around when we put the treadmill ...
customer_reviews.text: Totally bunched and slid around when we put the treadmill on top of it. Congratulations!!! You got my money. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: intermediate player

customer_reviews.title: fits, works
customer_reviews.text: This product made it possible for me to keep my new, $1,600 Nordictrack treadmill desk, even though we had to rearrange the house, leaving a plushly carpeted room as the only candidate for the treadmill to be re-located in. The treadmill functions fine (inc. incline).
customer_reviews.author: Jane Doe

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like the folding mat for exercise equipment but because it is so flexible it tends to bunch up under my treadmill from time to time. I use it on a high pile carpet in order to keep the fibers from getting in the underneath the treadmill and it keeps moving up under the machine. Other than that it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Queennefertit

customer_reviews.title: Happy costumer
customer_reviews.text: This mat is exactly what I was looking for when I got my new treadmill. It’s long enough to cover the whole space and easy to fold if I want to put it away. My package came fast and in good condition. Buy, you won’t regret it
customer_reviews.author: Marie Mosso

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mat for equipment or floor exercise
customer_reviews.text: Although the item did not have the "Stamina" brand printed on it, it matches my previous purchase and appears to be made by the original manufacturer. It is rather thin but strong and comfortable to do exercises on. Probably the most important characteristic in our house is that because it folds accordian style, the dog and cat hair remains on the bottom and so we don't get it all over our clothes and bodies. This is a very nice product. Our first one was for under our treadmill. This one was for floor exercising.
customer_reviews.author: btown3

customer_reviews.title: Please read
customer_reviews.text: Price is great, came quickly and did not have any odors. We have a precor 546i at home which is a big heavy commercial grade elliptical and it fit perfectly on this mat. I have no doubt it will protect my wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Thick sticky/sturdy mat
customer_reviews.text: Ours hasn't had a lot of use yet, but it's a safe base under the stationary bike we purchased.
customer_reviews.author: CLC - Chatham NY

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum-resistant
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, I love the folding feature & my full-size treadmill fit perfectly. The only flaw is that the type of material is very susceptible to animal hair. I have an apartment with cats & a dog (lack of space results in the treadmill in the living room} and this mat is resistant to any vacuum, really, no luck with my Dyson or Shark hand-vac. Have to wipe down every inch before working out to make sure the hair doesn't get in the motor. So, overall great mat but I just wish the rubber (?) was a bit more hair/dust resistant or at least could be vacuumed.
customer_reviews.author: Cait

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly with my elliptical
customer_reviews.text: Strong, easy to clean, does not stick to the wooden floor. Perfect choice for me. I have nothing bad to say about this. Have it for about a year now.
customer_reviews.author: GOOD TIMES

customer_reviews.title: Great under Bowflex
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research to find a good mat to put under our bowflex. After comparing lots of mat options we decided to give this one a try and we’ve been very happy with it. It’s a perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy C.

customer_reviews.title: great product with wired registration requirements
customer_reviews.text: the mat itself is great and we put our elliptical machine on it which fits very well. my only complaint was the product/warranty registration website that asks for product number and serial number. I looked through everywhere on the mat but could not find it.
customer_reviews.author: cailiqingsheng

customer_reviews.title: keeps the noise level down too!
customer_reviews.text: This protects the workout equipment and my floor/rugs, so it's a win-win for me. People workout, people sweat, the mat catches the sweat. And then you clean the mat. The mat also helps with less impact between floor and machine. So early morning workouts plus mat and sleeping children works great in my household.
customer_reviews.author: Serve2Care

customer_reviews.title: Cat AND rower approved
customer_reviews.text: It does the job well! It prevents my rower from sliding around just great. Light weight and not too thick. Easy to clean and fold back up for next time. Also, my cat loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Posada

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Bowflex M5.  Folds are a great feature!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect as a base for our BowFlex M5 trainer. The folds are definitely a nice bonus feature. I am able to fold the ends up in order to shorten the mat to match the footprint of the machine. No tail ends sticking out. Conforms very nicely. I would definitely recommend this over other mats that can't fold to match the footprint of the machine you put it under.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Phive

customer_reviews.title: Does its job.
customer_reviews.text: This rubber mat arrived when expected, as expected. I bought it to put underneath my small portable elliptical machine, to provide some cushion and traction against the basement floor. It is light and easy to maneuver. I like the guide-lines that it has, so that you can fold it to whatever size you need by even sections. However, I'm annoyed that I can't fold it directly in half. There are an odd number of "sections" so there isn't a guide-line to be folded down the middle. Minor inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Does just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a new home with laminate floors and wanted to get something that would protect them from our very heavy elliptical. It’s very thick padding and makes it so the machine isn’t digging into our floors. Love that it folds also because I didn’t need the full length of the mat for my fitness equipment and it folded easily.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great bang per buck
customer_reviews.text: I got this mat to put underneath my road bike while it's attached to a stationary trainer. It has room to spare and is the correct length. It's foldable to adjust to other exercise equipment in your house. It does its job well by protecting our floor from scratching and from sweat. The only reason I give it 4 stars and not 5 are because you have to put in a wee bit of extra effort to wipe sweat out of the folding grooves. I am happy with my purchase and do recommend it others.
customer_reviews.author: HawkeyeCubs34

customer_reviews.title: Good for exercise and other things.
customer_reviews.text: We actually originally purchased this mat to do sit ups on on our hard floor. For that it works well. It doesn't slip and has good padding. The fact that it folds up is probably the most useful part about it if you don't want to leave it out all of the time. We also use it under our furniture as well. We have wood floors and couches and chairs that recline. To keep the feet from scratching up the floors, we put these underneath and they work well. The creases where it folds actually make it easy to trim down (like for a recliner) if you don't need a piece that long.
customer_reviews.author: JJG

customer_reviews.title: Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to go under my recumbent bike. I love my bike and this mat makes it easier to ride before work without waking my downstairs neighbors. It looks really nice. I like that I can fold it to size. It's easy to keep clean and dust free with a broom, a very quality made product.
customer_reviews.author: DanaS

customer_reviews.title: Great and Tough material
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised of the material this item is made out of. It does not feel cheap and is holding strong from all the abuse it gets from the treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Get Fit-Stay Fit-Fold To Fit Mat!
customer_reviews.text: Step right up! And for just 1 thin dime, just 1/10th of a dollar I'll show you the very best certified, verified guaranteed bonafide folding mat to keep you fortified! I've got two of these and it's as good as it gets for the price. The pad is a bit thin for some floor exercises but it's still protecting your floor if not your knees and elbows. I expected the trainer to wear through, so I used large felt furniture pads under the feet and on top of the mat, so the mat is protecting the floor mostly from drips. I hope I've been of assistance.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J.

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Originally, I was worried about the seams allowing my treadmill to migrate across the floor still, however this may does exactly what it claims. I am very happy with it and it protects the floor well from as ratchets and scuffs. It also reduced the treadmill noise by a good amount.
customer_reviews.author: Trenton D Moore

customer_reviews.title: I use this almost every day now
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well designed product. It is very thin, which makes it easy to stow after use, but it made me worry that it would not absorb much punishment during my workouts. I was wrong. It is a great cushion, and the mat has other, cool design features. The prefolds make it easy to set-up and put away. One side has a very rough surface that grips the floor. Even on my hardwood floors the mat does not skate around. I highly recommend this product. In service, Rich
customer_reviews.author: Reasonable Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my treadmill and crosstrainer. They are great love that they fold up for when treadmill is up. Only thing is they attract all the cat hair! So lots of cleaning is expected. The hair glides along the wood floor ND collects on the Mats.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey
customer_reviews.text: I wished I knew before buying mat that is not good to use on carpet and is slippery when wet. Beware. Overall I like that it can be fold to fit to your equipment. It's too late to return, i will just use mat to do some yoga
customer_reviews.author: yazi

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I had previously purchased Exercise Equipment Floor Mat  and it is still holding up well. I decided to try this mat since it could be folded to fit the space as needed. It's a good mat, but I'm not crazy about the folding line areas. They will not relax and become completely flat. It's not a function problem, just aesthetics. For a few more dollars, I will purchase the Exercise Equipment Floor Mat again. If you need to save money and don't mind the folds, this mat should work great. I have mine on a wood floor for my elliptical.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Great & Helpful
customer_reviews.text: We have a few of these. All for different purposes. But this one is for under our elliptical. It’s great. We have 2 others under our dog cages.
customer_reviews.author: feba0

customer_reviews.title: Durable & Convenient
customer_reviews.text: It's so thick and durable for me to drive a 400lb plus wheelchair onto it without getting snagged or damaged, while light enough to easily fold up and store. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Marquez

customer_reviews.title: ... use this for HIIT workouts and it does a great job of dampening the loud sounds that come along ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this for HIIT workouts and it does a great job of dampening the loud sounds that come along with tiredly setting weights down, jumping, and cussing. Now my downstairs neighbor really has to concentrate to figure out what all of the thuds and four-letter expletives are about. "She really likes fudge and bowling." It also offers plenty of cushion without losing stability. It slides around a teeny bit because it is on a hardwood floor, but not enough to mess my workouts up. For the price, it is an excellent deal.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice mat. I was very pleased. I would recommend this product. Helps prevent skids on your flooring and it was a thick durable material.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Glover

customer_reviews.title: Great for any workout
customer_reviews.text: I bought these mats to protect our hardwood floors when I am doing my workouts. I wound up buying multiple mats and taping them together to create a large cushioned space. These are thin enough to lay under our living room rug and go unnoticed unlike the puzzle piece mats that were a bit thicker. They provide a nice cushion under the rug and are great for my workouts as well. If you are going to use them as a regular mat, I recommend these vs. the roll mats. Roll mats tend to never lay flat so you have the potential to trip on them. These lay flat and fold up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Mr&Mrs Esau

customer_reviews.title: Good mat to place under exercise equipment
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these mats to place underneath a recumbent bike and an elliptical and they fit very well width-wise. The mats are a little long but folding the ends over makes it a bit bulky so we just leave them full length. Both machines stay perfectly in place on top of them and the mats are easy to vacuum along with the rest of the room. They tend to show the dust a bit, like the hardwood floor they are on (we live in a dry and dusty place - it's not my lack of housekeeping skills, honest!). A pretty good mat and one that I would definitely buy again if we were to add any more gym equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Millie B

customer_reviews.title: Nice folding feature, but came damaged.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3. One was damaged-it had a big hole in it. I was able to hid the top under my baseboard heat, but I shouldn’t have had to do that. I missed the return window because I didn’t open the box right away to check the products. I won’t make that mistake again.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Darling

customer_reviews.title: Large mat - good size for exercising - but VERY thin
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an exercise mat that would fold up instead of roll up, because when you think about it, if you put a mat on a dirty floor and then roll it up, the dirty side will touch the clean side. A folding mat avoids that problem, as the clean side never touches the dirty side. This mat is a great size, very long and wide, folds up compactly, but is VERY thin and not so comfortable if you put it on a wood floor. Other mats may be more padded, but then it wouldn't be as compact. If you put it on a carpeted floor then it should feel much better.
customer_reviews.author: SusanTech

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, Durable, Light
customer_reviews.text: I have only had it a few days but I love the way it easily folds to the length I need for my Elliptical. It is a great value. Looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Rushing, Rushing To Meet Your Needs

customer_reviews.title: Stamina Fold-To-Fit Folding  Exercising Matt
customer_reviews.text: It fits well for our Tread Mill, And Our Exercising Bicycle. Very Durable and The Price Is A Good Price For This Exercising Foldable May. It’s Also Very Easy Too Clean And Too Fold It Away.
customer_reviews.author: Earl B.

customer_reviews.title: It's working fine after a few months.
customer_reviews.text: This mat seems to work fine. It doesn't move under my equipment, and it's protecting my floor quite well. It was too long for what I needed it for, and was really easy to cut and fit to closer to size.
customer_reviews.author: M.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great mat for home gym
customer_reviews.text: This is my second mat purchased to go under our new treadmill. We bought our first one three years ago for our elliptical. It’s very durable and serves the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: VGP

customer_reviews.title: They fold nicely so they are easy to tuck away when not ...
customer_reviews.text: I would give these a much higher rating but unfortunately these have some sort of slick coating on them, so don't sweat on them and expect to be doing any jump squats... I've cleaned them twice with soap and water which has helped, but they are still twice as slick as my old Golds Gym mat that looks identical and likely made in the same factory. Note for context - I use these as a base for a standard yoga mat, cycling rollers, rowing machine, and free weights in my garage. They fold nicely so they are easy to tuck away when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Better than a 5-star rating
customer_reviews.text: While I could care less about our less-than-ideal carpet in the basement, I still wanted to have something to put our new elliptical trainer on. I found this to be the least expensive, but certainly not lacking in the quality department. Our elliptical trainer is 83" long so this was one of the only mats that were acceptable in size. The thickness of the mat was more than most others that I considered purchasing also. It has the added bonus to be able to fold-to-fit, but we use it in its entirety. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Long enough for my ergometer. Slightly tacky for stability. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: 2galooQT

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding mat - Durable
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding mat. I have a Schwinn stationery bike in my apartment (rental) with hardwood floors. So i needed something that would withstand the weight and protect the floors. THIS MAT DOES IT. I've had it for 9 months. Pulled the bike off the mat at 7 months and no marks on my floor. (Thank god)
customer_reviews.author: 1 special rose

customer_reviews.title: Love these mats
customer_reviews.text: Converting a bedroom into an exercise room and bought two of these mats. Perfect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Afeather

customer_reviews.title: it's more like a Yoga mat
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, it's more like a Yoga mat. It's a lot thinner than I expected. It protects hardwood floors and relieves some pressure on the carpet; but it doesn't prevent my workout equipment from "bleeding through" and leaving indents in my carpet. It does it's job but it's certainly not worth $30
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A GREAT MAT!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS MAT! I love that is folds to size, without looking bulky! Also, it folds up so flat that will.be great to store if need be, unlike the ones that awkwardly roll. It is a very good quality mat and though I just received it, I see it lasting!! Plus the price was outstanding. I have a large elliptical and it fits beautifully with one section folded under.
customer_reviews.author: Review#1

customer_reviews.title: It just lies there
customer_reviews.text: It works just fine. It holds a treadmill and our cats love clawing it with no visible damage afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Wall

customer_reviews.title: Works as Designed
customer_reviews.text: I use the mat under my treadmill. The thickness of the mat is perfect. I'm pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: aiwamu

customer_reviews.title: Working as advertised and expected.
customer_reviews.text: I'm turning a spare bedroom into a fitness room and bought 3 of these folding mats to go under exercise equipment. I like the fact that you can fold the mat to a size the is adequate for the particular piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Very Convenient mat
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect if you have to worry about space. I have a treadmill in a small room and both the mat at full length and the treadmill take up a lot of space. It makes a big difference to be able to fold both of these up when they are not in use. Being able to fold it up makes it easier to move as well. It is not as thick as I imagined but I also never took out a measuring tape to see exactly how thick it was. It is very durable though and it protects the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Takes awhile to flatten out, but it does it's job well.
customer_reviews.text: We put our big elliptical on this mat to save the carpet. Initially the mat was folded so tightly for shipping it wouldn't spread flat. This made the initial installation a bit difficult, but after a few days it flattened out. Lifting a heavy elliptical while your spouse adjusts the mat can lead to fights and other unpleasantries. Overall, It looks good and the next step is to actually use the elliptical machine for exercising and not hanging clothes on. Baby steps..
customer_reviews.author: vento

customer_reviews.title: Useless. DON'T waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Cheap mat. Constantly wrinkles everytime I use my rower. Useless. DON'T waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Brooks

customer_reviews.title: It's what was described
customer_reviews.text: Durability, don't know. We just got it. Size and texture are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Asher F. Cardoza

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for your floors
customer_reviews.text: I have a mat under my Sole E35 (elliptical) and Sole F80 (treadmill). I wanted to protect the flooring underneath (hardwood and tile) and for that they are perfect. It does make it more difficult to roll the machines on the mats, but nothing prohibitive. As a cushion to lessen the sounds of impact from the treadmill, however, it's not really effective. I'm still searching for that. I also wanted to note that the sizing is perfect and no folding or cutting was necessary for the Sole machines.
customer_reviews.author: K. Truong

customer_reviews.title: Does the job. Maybe needs a few more fold marks.
customer_reviews.text: This has an odd number of fold marks. I couldn't quite get it short enough under my new recumbent bike. It's also rather wider than needed. I didn't want to cut it at first, but I may do that, now that I know it works for me. It's well made, and very convenient. It's protecting my carpet (I looked). And it was a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a superb product! Ideal for home!
customer_reviews.text: I'm super satisfied by this purchase. It's even better than what I had expected. Thick but Very compact and felt very sturdy. Absolutely great for any home gym. Easily foldable. Especially great for a simple squat rack (not cage though). In fact I'm gonna buy one more. It's a bargain in this price once you get this in your hands. It does have that plastic smell though.
customer_reviews.author: Guy2

customer_reviews.title: Nice pad!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my treadmill. Perfect size and well made. Great protection for my carpet.
customer_reviews.author: E. Slone

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Mat...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use under my new Sole 80 treadmill. Looks good, does what I wanted it to do, and I look forward to many years of trouble-free use. Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Spike

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, easy to use. I have 2 of the segments folded under one end of my bike, and it doesn’t cause any noticeable imbalance. Seems durable enough, although it’s not very thick. Should be enough to protect the wood floor. Happy so far!
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to protect wood floors.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my treadmill really well with a little extra room. Arrived quickly and in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great mat - I get compliments about it
customer_reviews.text: Works great - the perforated segments can be used to cut it to a shorter length if needed or it also looks just fine leaving it the full length as-is (it is not very wide but the width is sufficient and fits well in the space I have it in).
customer_reviews.author: Leslie M

customer_reviews.title: Now this is a mat I can stand behind (or ON - as the case may be)
customer_reviews.text: Looks and behaves exactly as advertised. I put it beneath my elliptical (to protect wood floor underneath) and easily folded up one section (cuz it was a "on section" longer than I had space for). You can't even tell distinguish the folder section from the others, which is exactly what I hoped would be the case. IMO, it is that "adjustability" makes it superior to other exercise mats. I simply love it (especially for the price). Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rikki B. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Great foldable mat!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat! No stinky rubber smell. Love that I can fold it to fit our needs. Like it so much we bought 3 of them! We have a Gazelle glider on one, another to use while lifting weights or using kettle bells & another to use while doing step Zumba. Mat helps to save a little wear & tear on our carpets. Love that we can fold it, slide it back into the box & throw in a closet for easy storage!
customer_reviews.author: Jami

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise mat
customer_reviews.text: It works very well and I use it with my Gazelle machine. At first it does have a strong odor so I let it air out for a few days and then it was ready to be used.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for under our bike we purchased. It was very long, however, all you need to do is fold it under to the size you want. That makes it perfect and bike does not ruin carpet nor does it move either while using the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for putting underneath a treadmill.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mat to go underneath my treadmill to protect the carpet. The size was absolutely perfect. Many of the other mats I looked out would have needed to be cut to fit nicely underneath but with this one I just folded down one of the sections and it was a perfect fit. It has been several months now and the mat is still in great condition and the carpet underneath my treadmill looks great.
customer_reviews.author: my3girls

customer_reviews.title: Great complement to Stamina Air Rower
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this along with the Stamina Air Rower and it's worked wonders. After assembling the rower, I had just started testing out the rower without the mat on my hardwood floors. Unfortunately, the rower would keep skidding and I'd keep on moving forward. Thus, I quickly busted the mat out of the box and with it, it stops the skidding and is a perfect size for the Air Rower. The mat does not take up too much room and does exactly what it's supposed to in protecting the floors. Probably don't need if you have carpet in your house, but I would highly recommend this complement to the air rower if you have hardwood or laminate flooring.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: great as floor mat
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this mat as an exercise mat to protect my oriental rug from my shoes & all the jumping etc doing jillian michaels 30 day shred. It does offer some cushioning but I prefer to use it with 1/2 inch yoga mat. im 5'2" & there's plenty of room to do all the plank poses and lunges with tons of room to spare while protecting my floors. It does get a little slippery if you start to sweat so i just keep a towel handy to wipe my hands before getting into a plank position. I love the way it folds as opposed to rolling. When I'm done it just slides under my couch and out of site!
customer_reviews.author: Eve Brown

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: Put it under my treadmill so it wouldn't slide, and works great. Too long, so I just folded one panel under and that's all there was to it.
customer_reviews.author: blackbelt28

customer_reviews.title: This mat lays smoothly and the quality is great! We ordered a row machine and with this ...
customer_reviews.text: This mat lays smoothly and the quality is great! We ordered a row machine and with this mat the row machine stays secure on our hardwood floors. We like so much we ordered a 2nd one so we can do stretches and weights as it provides added cushion to our hard floors.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Jones

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, good deal
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these several months ago to sit under a large elliptical machine, bow flex and stationary bike. They are fairly thick and have protected our carpet from indentations and sweat. The ridges from where it was folded settled out nicely. Other reviews mentioned an odor, which I was nervous about, but we haven't noticed any problems with this. I would recommend this item for protecting your floors, Good quality and much less expensive than at the health/fitness stores.
customer_reviews.author: GoBigBlue

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: The mat was about a foot longer then my treadmill so I folded the front under. I actually like that I can do this since that is where the most weight is and I am hoping it will better protect our hardwoods.
customer_reviews.author: PrincessGingerSnapp

customer_reviews.title: All you need
customer_reviews.text: Durable. Doesn’t move. Bought to replace my yoga mat for working out and works very well
customer_reviews.author: Shantell M

customer_reviews.title: Folding Mat
customer_reviews.text: I own two of these mats now. I use one under my elliptical and the other under my exercise bike. These mats are very nice, great size, with no damage to the hardwoods underneath. The only down side is they do come "folded" I guess since its a folded mat and the creases never really relax.. It's fine if your using it for equipment but I'd never want to workout on one of these. I have a yoga mat I use to workout on and its rolled instead of folded so when you lay it out it stays better then something folded with creases.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Love

customer_reviews.title: Good mat for workout
customer_reviews.text: Title of product says that it is for equipment but I find that the mat is good for working out with as well. For example the mat worked really well using it while performing mountain climber exercise. Material is strong, not overtly slippery and it has no odor. The only negative aspect I found was that the folds tend to stick up when opened completely. This can be overcome by overlaying a heavier item over the folds until the mat flattens out.
customer_reviews.author: Hoenlrj

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price. I like that you can make it larger or smaller. Worked well with my light weight treadmill. If I had a heavier piece of machinery then I would want it to be thicker. Loved that it did not stink like so many of the mats that I have wanted in the last few years (the ones that smell like burning tires or someone putting tar on a roof).
customer_reviews.author: ABThomasTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Protects the floor, stores easily
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to protect my hardwood floor from my folding exercise bike - it fits well when folded double under the bike. It's thin enough that even folded double, it's only about 1/2" thick. It has some stiffness to it but has perforations (or, more to the point, carve-outs - they don't go all the way through the mat) to make it easy to fold. It's textured to make it less slippery, but still carries a warning that it's slippery when wet. Seems as if it will protect the floor very well, and since it folds to 1' W x 3' L x less than 1' D, it's easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: I’m really pleased with the quality of this may
customer_reviews.text: I’m really pleased with the quality of this may. I have our recumbent stepper on it. I’ve ordered another for my husband’s motorized scooter to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Star Wife

customer_reviews.title: Slightly thicker then a yoga mat, but not bad...
customer_reviews.text: I placed it on the garage floor so I could place a treadmill on it. Prior to doing that, I used it to lay on and stretch after I would come back from a run. It has a yoga mat feel to it and it's not very thick. I think if you were looking for it to absorb shock, you might want to go with a thicker mat. I would care more if it were in our home, versus our shore house.
customer_reviews.author: Tessy C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for our full size treadmill
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality, foldable mat that fits under our completely full sized treadmill with some room to spare. We've got it in a room with hardwood floors, so we were very nervous about any potential damage to or scuffing of the floors. It's been 6 months, and so far, not a single problem at all. It's held up extremely well under the heavy treadmill (and, uh, slightly heavy runner on top), without too much permanent smushing. It helps cushion the floor, deaden the sound, and overall makes us very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: This mat is a little different from the more common mat I am familiar with. this one is a little thinner, and folds up like an accordian rather than being rolled up. It appears to be plenty strong, but I suppose if you were careless or if you used it for years it might tear. It is larger than the roll up type I'm used to and so errant sweat drops are caught better. I like the fold up design because the roll ups tend to unravel immediately and this one stows quite nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my bike on a trainer
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my bike on a trainer. I have it on hardwood floors. I had it down for 2 months before checking how the floors looked, moved it and absolutely no marking or staining on the floor. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren R

customer_reviews.title: It seems to be working out fine. We use it under our treadmill and over ...
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be working out fine. We use it under our treadmill and over our hardwood floor. Works well for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Bobba74

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for protecting carpet underneath exercise equipment
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to go with Sunny Air Magnetic Rower, SF-RW5623. It fits perfectly underneath the rowing machine with plenty of overlap on the sides and ends to protect the carpeting.
customer_reviews.author: Not_an_expert

product_meta.title: Stamina Fold-to-Fit Folding Equipment Mat (84-Inch by 36-Inch)
product_meta.description:
Get the Most Out of Your Equipment
This high quality equipment mat helps protect your floors from damage that workouts can inflict. Use the Stamina Fold-To-Fit Equipment Mat with almost any of your exercise equipment in any space. The closed cell foam material is tough yet soft enough to absorb impact, eliminate vibration and stop carpet fibers from getting into the moving parts of your equipment. Ideal for stationary bikes, elliptical trainers, steppers, rowing machines, AeroPilates reformers, weight benches, mini trampolines and many other pieces of exercise equipment that you may have.

AMAZON.COM
Protect your floor from unsightly blemishes and nasty gouges with this Stamina fold-to-fit equipment mat. Designed to sit underneath most exercise equipment or to serve as a shock absorber for aerobic workouts, the mat is made of a closed-cell foam material that's tough yet soft, helping it absorb impact, eliminate vibration, and stop carpet fibers from migrating into the moving parts of your equipment. In addition, the mat measures a robust 84 by 36 inches (W x L), making it large enough to accommodate stationary bikes, elliptical trainers, stair steppers, rowing machines, Pilates reformers, ski machines, home gyms, weight benches, and mini trampolines. As a result, you needn't worry about scuffing your hardwood floor with gouges and scrapes, or creating nasty tears in your carpet. Finally, the mat is divided into seven folding sections, so you can easily customize it to any size of machine. The mat--which includes a textured, nonslip pebble surface that cleans easily--measures 1/4 inch thick and weighs roughly 7 pounds.
feature_bullets: Place under equipment to protect carpet and floors
Textured, non-slip pebble surface is easily cleaned
Size: 3' wide x 7' long;Use with most exercise equipment like stationary bikes, rowers, treadmills, inversion tables, Pilates reformers, ellipticals, rebounders, weights, cross trainers and more
1/4" thick closed cell foam material ; Weight: approximately 7 lbs
